amendatorysection.catchline: Purchase of microfilm system or equipment; approval; property of administrator.
amendatorysection.para: No state agency shall purchase any microfilm system or equipment prior to the approval of the administrator. The administrator shall not approve internal microfilm activities of any state agency unless such activities may not be feasibly provided by the central microfilming agency and are necessary to a particular operation within the state agency. Any equipment purchased under this section shall become the property of the administrator.
